name: Pumpkin Doggo!
description:
#gmtkjam 2021 game jam! "Joined Together"

Help Pumpkinking get his doggo back to the castle! The only way to unlock the castle gates is to collect all the pumpkin seeds, but watch out for the thorns, they can damage Doggo! Pumpkin king is used to thorns so he doesn't get hurt by them. Carefully cross the vines and don't fall!

Can you save Pumpkin Doggo?!

Controls:

WASD - Move

Mouse - Look

Credits:

Art: PumpkinKingIsDead (Except for the skybox)

Programming: PumpkinKingIsDead

3rd Party Assets I used:

Music: A Casual Music Pack - Cafofo (Unity Asset Store)

Skybox: Free Skybox Extended Shader - Boxophobic (Unity Asset Store)

Dynamic Bone (Unity Asset Store)

Software Used:

Game Engine - Unity3D.

3D Modeling - Autodesk Maya

Texturing - Photoshop
